instructions: Place the dinner plate at the bottom center of the table cloth.
Place the dinner fork to the left of the dinner plate with the tines pointing upward.
Place the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork, parallel to the dinner fork.
Place the dinner knife to the right of the dinner plate with the blade pointing up.
Place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife, with the tips of the blades at the same level.
Place the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife, with the bowl pointing up.
Place the water glass above the dinner knife and slightly to the left.
Place the wine glass to the right of the water glass so that it is above soup spoon.
Place another wine glass to the right of the first wine glass, centered at bottom of the first glass.
Place the coffee cup to the right of the spoon and below the second wine glass.
Place the bread plate just above the forks, centered on the dinner fork.
Put the butter knife across the top right of the bread plate, with its blade at the top and handle to the right.
Place the dessert fork above the dinner plate with the tines pointing to the right.
Place the dessert spoon above the dessert fork with the bowl pointing to the left.
Place the napkin vertically on the dinner plate.
